info.name: Google Search in columns
info.description: This is a CSS that transform Google Search into multiple (default two) columns.
info.additionalInfo: Google frequently changes the layout of their search page. As of 02/03/2016, it works. However, there is no guarantee it will work indefinitely.

data.title: Would you support Google 検索ツールをサイドバーへ ?
How to set width of the left margin of google search result page?
